forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 49. West wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds with a gentle brightness enveloping the city, creating a mostly sunny canvas that radiates warmth through the delicate breeze. As the day inches towards 64 degrees, you may notice the temperatures easing back to a comforting 61 as the sun dips lower in the sky. The west wind whispers softly at 10 to 14 mph, punctuating the tranquility with occasional gusts, subtly invigorating the atmosphere. The scenery is marked by only the lightest hint of marine influence, as the coastal fog seems to linger at bay, preserving the gleaming skyline while casting a dreamy haze in the distance.

As evening approaches, the clouds will gather just a touch, offering a partly cloudy mood that hints at a cool embrace later tonight, settling around 49 degrees. With the continued gentle winds, a light jacket or layered clothing will greet you warmly as you wander the city streets. This serene setting invites casual pursuits: perhaps a leisurely stroll along the waterfront to witness the sun's final curtain call, or a quiet visit to a local café, savoring a warm drink while the world tilts towards twilight. The day beckons you to take it easy, to lose yourself in simple moments that might reveal new delights in this vibrant yet gentle cityscape.
